idea:
8Directions is startup home services & financial services. The platform helps customers hire trusted professionals for services like, insurance, travel, pharmacy, electronics repair, cleaning, plumbing, carpentry, interior design, wedding photography, dancer, etc. We have started operations just in august 2020 and builting our network hand-picked service professionals, and served the customers across Palghar District.


Thought Behind 8Directions:-

If one way of your journey has closed you have 

rest seven ways to move ahead.
name: 8Directions

idea:
lakshya Aerospace is a small startup from Mumbai, India. At Lakshya Aerospace, we built unmanned aerial vehicles, the purpose of our startup is to help the public with getting their deliveries on time, rather it is medicine delivery or delivery of a pouch of blood to the hospital, our drones will solve all the problems faced by you while delivering your parcel.

 Our drones are designed by talented young designers, who completely make our drones unique and attractive to our customers. Our drones are especially unique in their design and their quick ability to deliver parcels saves time and effort.

Our drones can also be used for building inspection, photography, and mapping.
name: Lakshya Aerospace

idea: Kawa is a Mumbai based space-tech company which builds critical infrastructure for space. We are on a mission to make space accessible and are also building a unified platform to serve geo-intelligence needs of all kinds.
name: SPACEKAWA EXPLORATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A biopharmaceutical company dedicated to discovering, developing, and delivering life-changing treatments will provide hope to underserved patient communities. RS Therapeutics (This name is just kept to reflect the company's name, not the finalized name only for the reference)* will be on its mission to develop therapies for this underserved patient population.Rs Therapeutics will be delivering its goal to transform the treatment and care of sickle cell disease (SCD), a lifelong, devastating inherited blood disorder. Rs Therapeutics will also be advancing its pipeline program in treating SCD, in development to address pain crises associated with the disease. Besides, Rs therapeutics drug discovery teams will work on new targets to develop the next generation of treatments for other severe rare disorders, immunological diseases, viral diseases, and cancer.
name: Rsapeutics

idea: MOAD represents a turn of realisation. Indulging aesthetics of digital with a perspective of brand identity is MOAD digital. A state of realisation turning towards digital which is depicted by an arrow. The typography used (Typo Round) states a complete circle showing an entire array of services provided by Moad, from start to end. Altogether the logo symbolises that it is finally time for you turn (Moad) digital with MOAD Digital.
name: Moad Digital
